cfo_headline: Fade EURUSD rallies. Don't chase upside.
cfo_view:
ACTION|||Fade EURUSD rallies. Don't chase upside.
CONDITIONS|||Not a conviction short. View breaks if upside pressure re-accelerates.
analyst_view:
• Valuation: Stretched rich (+2.5σ vs macro fair value); snapback risk is elevated.
• Pressure: Weekly signals show compressing (56% probability); forces working to close the gap.
• Technicals: Trend is constructive; no signs of reversal yet.
• Positioning: Neutral; no material asymmetry.

So what:
The setup supports fading rallies, but technicals and positioning haven't confirmed yet—so keep it tactical, not conviction.

regime_label: Fade EURUSD rallies. Don't chase upside.
implication: Overvaluation fading → fade rallies, but trend is supportive
